task_manager_prompt.instruction: Prepare a task description for collaboration of the following roles in priority order:

note.task_preparation: Prepare the task in a single document describing phases for all roles and create a subtask for the current task.
note.kanban_integration: After creating the task, create a task in vibe-kanban.

error_correction_phase.instruction: At the end of task execution, add instructions for the agent to start the application.

error_loop.step: If any errors occur, fix them and repeat the action until the application starts successfully.
After that, run tests and follow the same procedure.

task.do: Вивчи документацію, яку я надав тобі вище, і на основі бест практіс побудуй скіли в ~/.claude/skills для агента, який будує скіли для проєктів.
